mapper.select: SELECT record.id, record.title, record.content, record.operationresult, record.projectid, record.createon, record.createby, detail.id, detail.createon, detail.createby, detail.devicename, detail.configurationtype, detail.filename, detail.operationresult FROM operationrecord record LEFT JOIN operationdetail detail ON record.id = detail.operationid where record.id = #{projectId}
